timeline.bodyText: How about just checking whether CALL_KOTLIN_SUSPENDING_METHOD is null instead of introducing another field?

timeline.bodyText:
Did we document about Kotlin suspending functions before? If so, how about adding a URL to the exception message? e.g.
Kotlin suspending functions are supported only when you added 'armeria-kotlin' as a dependency.
See https://armeria.dev/.... for more information.
